title: Mass of FeS2 from two reaction

content.description: <math alttext="Step 1: 4 F e S 2, solid, plus 11 O 2, gas, react to produce 2 F e 2 O 3, solid, plus 8 S O 2, gas. content.question: Extraction of <math alttext="F e, solid" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mi>F</mi><mi>e</mi></mstyle><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> from pyrite, <math alttext="F e S 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>F</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>S</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></math>, is a two-step process, as represented above.
